content:
Our new daily podcast gives you context and clarity on the stories shaping your world

ANOTHER WEEK, another round of US-Chinese trade negotiations. As domestic and economic pressures on both sides have eased, the path to a resolution seems ever more distant. Apple’s entry into the media business is the latest move in a reshuffling of the entire entertainment industry. And why nobody should be fooled by Kim Jong Un's relaxed appearance. Runtime: 19 min.

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.runtime environment: 运行环境;运行时环境;行环境;环境
wp.runtime error: 运行时出错;运行时错误;运行时间错误;运转时出错
wp.Common Runtime: 公共运行时;语言和通用运行时;公共运行环境;运行库
wp.Runtime Database: 运行时数据库;运行数据库;分布式动态数据库
wp.runtime host: 运行时主机;执行阶段主机;库宿主
wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
vt. 放松；解开；[计] 展开

wp.domestic flight: 国内航班;国内班机;国际航班;国内航线
wp.domestic building: 住用建筑物;住宅大厦;居住房屋;非住用建筑物
wp.domestic vacancy: 空置住宅楼宇;空置住宅单位
wp.domestic price: 国内价格;出口国价格;本土价格;		国内市场价格
wp.domestic sewage: 生活污水;家庭污水;生活排水;城市污水
wp.domestic export: 本地产品出口;国内出口

ex: adj. 国内的；家庭的；驯养的；一心只管家务的
eg2: The film turns about a domestic tragedy.
这部影片主要讲述一个家庭悲剧。
She was twittering about domestic trivialities.
她在嘁嘁喳喳地说着些家庭琐事。
Low prices crimped domestic output and foreign imports.
低物价阻碍了国内出口和国外进口。

ex: 网络 议付；交涉；押汇
eg2: peace/trade/wage, etc. negotiations
和谈、贸易洽谈、工资谈判等
They begin another round of negotiations today.
他们今天开始另一轮的谈判。
to enter into/open/conduct negotiations with sb
和某人开始╱展开╱进行谈判
The rent is a matter for negotiation between the landlord and the tenant.
租金可以由房东和租户协商确定。
A contract is prepared in negotiation with our clients.
我们和客户协商起草了一份合同。
The issue is still under negotiation .
这个问题还在商讨之中。
The price is generally open to negotiation .
一般来讲，价格可以商量。

ex: vt. 重新洗牌；改组；重作安排
eg2: The king also carried out a minor cabinet , but he only replaced ministers in the public services, rather than those in the interior and defense departments who oversaw this month's violence.
国王也推动了一次小型的内阁改组，但他只更换了公共服务相关部门的部长，未触及内政部和国防部这些对本月的暴力事件有责任的官员。
If Mr Kouchner leaves his job in the reshuffle expected soon, he will still be one of France’s most popular politicians.
如果库什内在即将到来的改组时离职，那么他仍将是法国最受欢迎的政治家之一。

ex: n. 解决；分辨；解析；决议
网络 分辨率；解析度；决心
eg2: to pass/adopt/carry a resolution
通过一项决议
The government is pressing for an early resolution of the dispute.
政府正在不断敦促早日解决这起纠纷。
The reforms owe a great deal to the resolution of one man.
这些改革主要归功于一个人的坚定决心。
She made a resolution to visit her relatives more often.
她决定要多走走亲戚。
Have you made any New Year's resolutions(= for example, to give up smoking from 1 January) ?
你有什么新年计划吗？
high-resolution graphics
高清晰度的图形

Title: China trade talks, entertainment wars and Kim Jong Unwinds

paperStatistics.title: China trade talks, entertainment wars and Kim Jong Unwinds
paperStatistics.desc: Our new daily podcast gives you context and clarity on the stories shaping your world
